🔒 I Like Android Privacy

On this page

Downloading ​

APKs, Files, Apps, etc...

App Stores ​

  • ⭐ F-Droid - FOSS App Store/Installer
  • ⭐ Droid-ify - F-Droid Client
  • Aurora Store - Alternative App Store

Modded APKs ​

SCAN YOUR DOWNLOADS!

Always remember to scan anything you download from one of these sites with one of the tools you can find here and you use an adblocker, you can find them here.

  • ⭐ Modyolo
  • ⭐ LiteAPKs
  • ⭐ Mobilism
  • AN1
  • A2ZAPK
  • PlatinMods
  • HappyMod
  • Androeed

Base APKs (Stock, Not Modded) ​

  • ⭐ APKPure
  • ⭐ APKMirror
  • APKCombo

APK Tools ​

  • ⭐ Lucky Patcher - App Patching / Guide
  • ⭐ Obtanium - App Updater from Source.
  • APKTool - APK Modification/Reverse Engineering Tool

Torrenting ​

WARNING

Torrenting itself can be legal, but piracy is not. I do not encourage piracy; you are accountable for your own actions. If you engage in piracy, be sure to use a VPN.

  • ⭐ Flud
  • ⭐ LibreTorrent
  • ⭐ nzb360
